name: hm06
effect: Teaches Rock Smash to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dive to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Rock Smash Gen II: Whirlpool)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A rock-crushingly
tough attack that
may lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A rock-crushingly
tough attack that
may lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An attack that may
also cut DEFENSE.
It can also smash
cracked boulders.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user slugs the foe with a
shattering punch. It can also smash
cracked boulders.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user slugs the foe with a
shattering punch. It can also smash
cracked boulders.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user slugs the foe with a
shattering punch. It can also smash
cracked boulders.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
Diving on the first turn, the user
floats up and attacks on the second.
It can be used for diving in the ocean.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
Diving on the first turn, the user
floats up and attacks on the second.
It can be used for diving in the ocean.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Diving on the first turn, the user floats
up and attacks on the next turn.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat. This move can also
shatter rocks in the field.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat. This move can also
shatter rocks in the field.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat. This move can also
shatter rocks in the field.
